item.title: Soy Guille
item.description: I take pictures. Play with electronics, telecommunicatons, IoT, home automation. I program a little, but poorly. I’d like to do woodwork. There is never enough tools or test instruments. I juggle, and dream, as my lifetime idol Claude Shannon, on someday achieving the 5 ball cascade. Electronics Engineer UNS, MBA IAE. Made in ENET (Technical highscool). In my last incarnation, learning AI/ML as Tecnox‘s CTO.
